title: Roasted sardines, mackerel and radishes
description: This simple summery dish is ready to eat in 20 minutes and offers a taste of Spain on your plate.
ingredients: 8 sardines, gutted and cleaned, butterflied and filleted (ask the fishmonger to do this for you)
4 fresh mackerel, gutted and cleaned, cut into large pieces (ask the fishmonger to do this for you)
1 small bunch fresh basil, leaves only, torn
salt and freshly ground black pepper
